#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

main(){

    int t; int n,a,b;

    cin >> t;

    while(t--){

        cin >> n;
        n=n/2;
        if(n%2==0) printf("%d\n",n*n/4);
        else printf("%d\n",((n/2)*(n/2+1)));

//  printf ( "floor of 2.3 is %.1lf\n", floor (2.3) );



    }


}
